Dwarka, New Delhi-110075 25.09 . 2012 No.11041/217/2007-Admn POLICY MATIERS-ADMINISIRATIONZENANCE (92/2012) (Decision taken on File NoNHALL104L/08L2O10-HRJIL Sub: Format of certificate for handing taking over charge by technical officers In supercession of the Circular No.11041_ /283-Misc/2009-Admn: dated 14.8.2012 (Annex -A), it has been decided all technical officers while taking/ handing over their charge should submit a detailed certificate in the format as per Annex-B_ 2 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority: (V.KSharma) Chief General Manager (Coord /LA) Alloliicersandemployees of HQIZORROsIPLUs[CMUs/Site_Oliices NHAL To,
